DOC.brief_summary: A study to evaluate solifenacin succinate in combination with tamsulosin for the treatment of residual OAB symptoms in men.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate Solifenacin Succinate in Combination With Tamsulosin for the Treatment of Residual Overactive Bladder Symptoms (OAB) in Men.
DOC.detailed_description: A 2 arm study ( 1 Active, 1 Placebo) to evaluate solifenacin succinate in combination with tamsulosin for the treatment of residual OAB symptoms in men
DOC.criteria: Symptoms of Overactive Bladder (OAB) Current use of antimuscarinic therapy Evidence of a urinary tract infection
